description:
Implement collapsing headers that shrink on scroll to maximize content space, but show a contextual title bar indicating current entity or section. Include a quick-return pattern where headers reappear when scrolling up slightly.

**Rationale:** Mobile screen real estate is precious. Collapsible headers can reclaim 15-20% of vertical space while maintaining context awareness. Users stay oriented without sacrificing content visibility.
title: Collapsible Header with Scroll Context
